meta.title: Translation company for online translation services
meta.description: Localistars is a website where companies can find high-quality online translation services performed by freelance translators.

section.subTitle: We are about transparency and trust.
section.title: Localization done directly with your partner

findBest.title: Find the best offer
findBest.text:
Client: Choose the best fitting translators.
Translator: Bid for suitable translation jobs of clients.
As client you accept bids based on price and experience of the translator. As translator you cherry-pick the projects you want to work on.

directContact.title: Direct contact
directContact.text: There is no middleman ‚Äì you get direct access to the experts. No annoying text monitoring or filtering. As client you may choose to collaborate with the same translators for future projects and grow your own team.

contentCentric.title: Content-centric
contentCentric.text: It's all about the content. Projects are set-up with content in mind so the localistars can work together effectively. Clients want to reach their global audience while translators want to choose from diverse tasks. We heard you both.

riskFree.title: Risk-free payment
riskFree.text: As a localistar you don't need to worry about your payment. Clients will only be charged if they approve the content provided by a translator. Translators always get paid on approval.

video.title: localistars teaser
video.text: Check out how localistars works and you will get your translation job done with our marketplace.

service.title: Efficient translation<1/>services & platform
service.text: Localistars is a easy-to-use translation platform<1/> that allows businesses of all sizes to purchase cost-effective translations using their translation-platform.

ms1.title: Competitive pricing
ms1.text: We are not a translation agency - we are a platform, so it's also not our pricing but your pricing.

ms2.title: Define your language pair
ms2.text: You may easily create a project where translators can apply, and then you simply choose the language pair and localistars will notify the appropriate translators for you.

ms3.title: High quality
ms3.text: All of your translation requirements may be met with a single simple solution. Submit your translation job now and receive bids, so you can choose from quick, high-quality translators in almost every language.

w1.text: Order your translations online<br class='d-none d-xs-block'>for your project or website.

w2.title: Localization
w2.text: Manage translation and development seperately <br class='d-none d-xs-block'> and enhance the internationalization of your company.

second.tabTitle: Our platform handles<br className='d-none d-xs-block' />everything for you

w1.title: Partner matching
w1.text: Relax while localistars notifies the translators that matches your needs.

w2.title: Easy accounting
w2.text: No need to waste time managing invoices. No matter if you work always with the same partner or with different partners, the payment workflow is still the same.

third.tabTitle: Use localistars for <br className='d-none d-xs-block' />any kind of business

w1.title: Websites and apps
w1.text: Use localistars for websites, applications, mobile apps, etc. of any kind.

w2.title: Video game
w2.text: Take your game to next level. Manage your game language easily and eliminate unnecessary communication in your team.

w3.title: Documents
w3.text: Not only software, but any kind of document can be translated.

for free below

meta.title: Find a translator on our platform
meta.description: On our online platform, you can hire a professional translator for your company's language translation project.

hero.title:
Why should you choose
a localistar translator?
hero.description: We provide a platform that removes the tedious parts of translations.

service.subTitle: Advantages
service.title: For companies looking for a translator
service.text: Let localistars marketplace do the tedious parts of your translation workflow.

as1.title: Find new translators with ease
as1.text: Stay on top of your task lists and stay in touch with what's happeningMore time to get projects done, less time wasted on searching and contracting. Overall localistars is your chance to up your time to market.

as2.title: Direct Contact
as2.text: localistars is about you. You're in direct contact with the translator ‚Äì it's your project, you hold the reins. In contrast to other services we DON'T set the price and therefore we DON'T forward the contract to the cheapest translator to maximize our own profit. You choose the translator for your projects yourself, it's your contractor.

as3.title: Invoicing
as3.text: No need to waste time managing invoices. It's all done automatically and VAT-compliant. You can download the documents for your accounting anytime. Focus on your job ‚Äì not on bookkeeping.

as4.title: Keep the overview
as4.text: Find all the information in one place. No need to skim through endless lists of emails.

content.subTitle: Few clicks away
content.title: Find the right translator for your need
content.text: You can post your requests in our translation marketplace for free and receive bids from translators within hours. This service is provided to you at no cost.

widget.title: Freelance or agency translators
widget.text: Within hours, you can get a high-quality translation from a professional translator or professional translation company.

manage.subTitle: Individual management
manage.title: Manage your team
manage.text: You can add all your team-members to your organisation. Each user can be granted individual rights so they get access to the relevant parts of your workflow. Keep working with partners you trust.

about.subTitle: Productivity increase
about.title: Versatile API
about.text: Automate your process for being more productive.

process.subTitle: Get started
process.title: It's very easy to start!<1/>Follow this process...

sp1.title: Sign up
sp1.text: Complete the registration process by confirming your email address. Click on the link in the received email.

sp2.title: Select your profile type
sp2.text: You are searching for a translator! Choose the "Client" profile type.

sp3.title: Update your personal profile
sp3.text: Time to make yourself a name - complete your personal user profile.

sp4.title: Having an organization
sp4.text: Providing an organization is mandatory. A contract is legally between your organization and the service requesting organization. You can either get invited to an existing organization or create a new one.

sp5.title: Create a project and call for bids
sp5.text: Here you can see how it works.

help.subTitle: HELP
help.title: Do you require some assistance before you register?
help.text: Any question you may have about our platform will be answered by one of our team members.

meta.title: Freelance Translator Website: Find a job
meta.description: On our website you will find freelance opportunities for language translation. Apply for the next translation job online.

hero.title: Why should you become<1/>a localistars translator?
hero.text: Our goal is to provide a platform that removes the tedious parts of translations.

service.subTitle: Services
service.title: That's why should you become a localistars translator!
service.text: Are you a freelance translator or a translation agency, then localistars is for you!

ms1.title: Direct Contact
ms1.text: localistars is about you. You're in direct contact with the client ‚Äì it's your task, you hold the reins. In contrast to other services we DON'T set the price and therefore we DON'T forward the contract to the cheapest translator to maximize our own profit. You make an offer, it's your client ‚Äì all we ask for is a small service fee on success to cover our own costs (transactions, currency exchange and development).

ms2.title: No risk
ms2.text: We only charge you a small service fee on successful payment. No hidden costs.

ms3.title: Invoicing
ms3.text: No need to waste time writing invoices. It's all done automatically and VAT-compliant. You can download the documents for your accounting anytime. Focus on your job ‚Äì not on bookkeeping.

ms4.title: Get paid
ms4.text: A project has to be funded by your client upfront. We hold back the money until the job is done and the client approves the translations. Then we'll transfer the sum to your account.

ms5.title: Find new clients with ease
ms5.text: More time to do the meaningful work, less time wasted on searching and contracting. Overall localistars is your chance to increase your income.

ms6.title: Keep the overview
ms6.text: Find all the information in one place. No need to skim through endless lists of emails.

w1.title: Your language profile
w1.text: New job opportunities matching your language profile are waiting for you.

w2.title: Notifications
w2.text: You periodically receive notifications for new projects.

w3.title: Get paid
w3.text: You can easily withdraw your earnings from your organisation section.

second.tabTitle: Keep working with partners you trust.

w1.title: Marketing
w1.text: Expand your personal reach <br class='d-none d-xs-block'> with the free possibility to be listed on localistars.

w1.title: Invite team members
w1.text: Especially for translation agencies, you can add all your team members to your organisation.

w2.title: Individual rights
w2.text: Each user can be granted individual rights so they get access to the relevant parts of your workflow.

process.subTitle: Get started
process.title: It's very easy to start!<1/>Follow this process...

sp1.title: Sign up
sp1.text: Complete the registration process by confirming your email address. Click on the link in the received email.

sp2.title: Select your profile type
sp2.text: You are looking for new translation jobs! Choose the "Translator" profile type.

sp3.title: Update your personal profile
sp3.text: To find a first translation job - fill your search criteria. Your language pairs.

sp4.title: Having an organization
sp4.text: Providing an organization is mandatory. A contract is legally between your organization and the service requesting organization.

cta.subTitle: Next steps
cta.title: Find out more or start for free
cta.text: See how clients and translators can work together on our platform.

ms2.title: For translators
ms2.text: Small service fee on approved task.

cta.title: No reason to postpone <1/>a registration now

hero.title: Translation projects
hero.text: Clients and translators welcome ‚Äì <1/>  together you get translation projects done.

one.subTitle: Looking for translator
one.title: Client
one.text: Make sure you have <1>set up your account.</1>

two.title: Create a project and call for bids
two.text: Create a new draft. Upload the files you need to be translated. Choose the target languages for the translation and call for bids. Done. Behind the scenes a translation project has been created. You can relax and wait for bids to show up.

three.title: Choose the right partner for your project
three.text: Choose the offer with the lowest price or the partner with the best reputation. The choice is yours. The new partner will be added to your list of translators, so in future it's easy for you to work with the same people again.

four.title: Fund the project
four.text: Before the translator may start working you'll need to fund the project. We hold back the money until you approve the provided translations. The translator can be sure the costs are covered while you can be sure to only be charged if you approve the content.

five.title: Approve the work
five.text: If you're happy with the work of your translator you approve the project. If there's something missing or in need of rework, give the translator a chance to improve the content. For disputes we introduced a special workflow as well.

six.title: Be charged
six.text: With approval of the project the provided funding will be paid out to the translator. You will get an invoice for your accounting. All past transactions can be viewed in the accounting section of your organisation.

one.subTitle: Looking for a job
one.title: Translator
one.text: Make sure you have <1>set up your account.</1>

two.title: Make an offer
two.text: The new project shows up in your list of new job opportunities. You can bid based on the content and metrics provided. If there's something unclear or you need additional details, you can reach out to the potential client anytime.

three.title: Get down to business
three.text: Do what you're best at. When the translations are done, upload the files and submit the job. During the project you can reach out to your client at anytime.

four.title: Get paid
four.text: Time to get paid. The money will be transferred to your localistars-balance and can be withdrawn at any time. All necessary reports for your accounting (invoices, VAT-reports, etc.) are available in your organisation section.

video.subTitle: Watch video
video.title: localistars is also integrated in locize
video.text: Check out how localistars can be integrated into our localization management platform locize visit the video or get more information about locize at the ecosystem overview.

ecosystem.title: Localistars is part of this ecosystem

hero.subTitle: Translation Marketplace
hero.title: We connect clients<1/>with translators
hero.description: localistars is the go-to marketplace for clients and translators to get translation jobs done. <1/> As client you'll find translators and as translator you'll find translation jobs. Direct contact, no middleman ‚Äì just collaborating localistars!
hero.text: localistars is the go-to marketplace for clients and translators to get translation jobs done.<1/>As client you'll find translators and as translator you'll find translation jobs. Direct contact, no middleman ‚Äì just localistars working together!
